name: CryptoCurrencyPrices
0:
”Alexa ask Crypto Currency, What is the price of Ethereum”
”What is the price of Litecoin”
”What is the price of bitcoin”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: crypto currency
des:
Get the prices of a range of crypto currency coins including bitcoin, ethereum and litecoin. As well as 900 + active & known coins are supported.

Currently supported coins: https://alexa.rob-balmbra.co.uk/crypt.php
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
